title: 成為你的風景 In Your Eyes

sub_contents.text:
--我的模樣有你的張望
我的朋友都很愛撐傘，他們在每場雨開場二十滴雨以內
就會撐開傘—而那瞬間我落在
他們的安全領域之外，假裝像個防水的超人

My friends all like to use umbrellas. They always open their umbrellas in the first 20 drops of the rain. And at the time, I’m outside of their safe-zone, pretending myself as a water-proof superman.

電子裝置。利用馬達控制雨傘開闔，握把上的開關可以驅動不同動態。雨傘裝設在各種人平常使用的角度和高度。
Electronic Installation. Use motor to control the opening/closing of umbrellas. The switch on the handles can trigger different motions. The umbrellas are set in the angles and heights that people normally take.
